cui_name: ACNE INVERSA, FAMILIAL, 2, WITH OR WITHOUT DOWLING-DEGOS DISEASE
reasoning: Hidradenitis suppurativa familial type 2 (AIFL2), associated with POFUT2/POGLUT1 mutations and Dowling-Degos disease phenotype. This is a rare syndromic form combining HS with skin/hair/nail changes and cardiac/GI involvement. Estimated 0.5 per 100k based on very limited case reports. Confidence limited due to rarity and variable phenotype.
